notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: I.M.-P. prepared and perform the experiments and wrote a first draft of the manuscript. E.K. and C.H. collaborate in the labelling experiments. E.K. analysed the NMR data. I.M.-P., E.K. and C.H. analyzed the GC/MS data. W.E. and I.M.-P. designed and supervised the labelling experiments. J.S. and I.A. designed the study. All authors discussed the results. J.S., I.A. and I.M.-P. prepared the final version of the manuscript.
